title: Mienai Sakebi
sinopse:
Story 1: A woman suspected his new husband plan to kill her for her money so it is to kill or to be killed.

Story 2: A young woman who want to die but can't and instead causing whoever help her dead.

Story 3: Someone who meet their doppelganger will end up dead.

Story 4: After Sally transferred abroad, an accident happen that caused the death of all her classmates and teacher. And now the whole class is back to fetch their left classmate.
